API_Description: Represents the modification date of the document in a specific format.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'ANSB_ModDate' suggests it is related to the modification date of the document. 'ModDate' is commonly used to denote modification date in document properties.
Returns: A string representing the modification date of the document.
Returns_Reason: Modification dates are typically represented as strings in a specific date-time format.

type.description: The format or type of the modification date string.
type.description_reason: The parameter 'type' is likely used to specify the format in which the modification date is returned, as different systems may require different date formats.
type.type_reason: The exact type is not specified, but it is likely a string or an enumeration representing different date formats.
